div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1606 Palestine, c. 1970 Burial: after 110/9 B.C. Contents: 92 AE Antiochus III-IV: 6 Ace: 56 (as BMC 1-10, dated 127/6- 110/9 B.C.) Unc. (probably Ace): 25 Tyre: 1 Hasmonaean: 3 Rome: 1 (3rd cent., intrusive) Disposition: dispersed Kindler, AHHI IV.3 (1970), pp. 41-6, illus. (in Hebrew)
